channel.title: [508]need some help with simple agility please. action timer help [508]
channel.description: hey alright so i have an agiltity obstacle net which you click and get 4k xp and some cash. but you can click it really really fast and get quick levels and cash. how can i put a action timer on it so you can like only click every 1-2 seconds? an example code would be great also -- once again im using a codeusa 508 base. thank you

item.title: [508]need some help with simple agility please. action timer help [508]
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

alright this is my agility obstacle net code in objectoption1.java

case 2284: Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 3000); p.appendExperience(6000, 16); p.setCoords(2846, 2960, 0); break;

There is no way to add a actiontimer or something to this? by the way object 2284 is a obstacle net…
if you know of one can you please post me a sample code [508 please]
thank you

still need some help please…

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

rigorous:

im usin a 562 source and know many 503+ servers that say this is impossible

Lol, It’s definantly not impossible.

No matter which type of server you have, 317, 474, 525, 562…

Its all Java.

Although i don’t know the exact syntax on how to even modify agility obstacles on a 508, Its defiantly possible.
